about_the_game:
Discover the new game universe of The Danger Zone:

  • A unique gameplay based shooter with side view, horror elements and immersive survival mechanics in a post-apocalypse setting.

  • Free Game Mode: A huge, uninhabited concrete shelter in which the player has to set up his life.

  • A world map with lots of sub-locations and points of interest. Explore unique, memorable places, discover hidden locations and geocaches.

  • Realistic and scenic environments. Changing weather, the cycle of day and night will increase immersion in the setting.

  • Realistic artificial intelligence systems that are on par with the constant lack of ammunition will keep even the most hardened players in suspense.

  • Over 200 in-game items and gear.

  • A large arsenal of weapons and a modding system.

Welcome to the new world

After thousands of intercontinental nuclear missiles had split the earth, enough time had passed: the era of eternal and cold winters was gone. The radioactive background has slowly drifted downward. And the people who had been living in underground shelters for a dozen years opened the gates of the seals again, smoldering with the hope of regaining control over the previously destroyed and lost world.

And in the end, we ended up back in the bunker

Having broken out of the underground dungeon, we were once again buried under a dense layer of earth in a concrete box - a bunker. It's dark, wet and incredibly cold. We're here for the long haul, so it would be nice to set up our new home and finally fix the hole in this rusty pipe.

This oppressive sky

As a result of global conflict, the world has undergone major changes. By pressing the red buttons, the leaders of the superpowers did not hesitate to exchange the most advanced means of destruction. The previously white-blue sky was forever colored in bright yellow shades, the radioactive background jumped dozens of times, and the district was filled with previously unknown and not very friendly creatures.

Outside the asylum is a huge open world

Around the refuge stretches a massive uncharted territory. Behind the edge of the forest area there may be a small abandoned village or a huge city, where everyone will find what they are looking for.

Attention! The global map will be changed and supplemented in each major content update.

There's danger all around

Widespread radioactive contamination is only one of the consequences of nuclear conflict. In addition to nuclear weapons, previously banned biological weapons have changed the fauna around you. Prepare to encounter creepy, frightening, and very unfriendly creatures along the way.

Every rifle is important

In a world where every piece of small arms is of great value, it is important to keep an eye on your equipment. The most detailed system of modifications will allow you to create a truly devastating means of defeat, even from weapons that have served their time. In pursuit of expanding the capabilities of their weapons can change anything. All accessories are based on real or close to real weapon prototypes and mods, which makes the game even more realistic.

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains scenes of alcohol and illegal substances, scenes of violence against living beings including humans and animals.

name: The Danger Zone

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: TBD
  • Processor: TBD
  • Graphics: TBD
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-10105F
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 Ti
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: The Danger Zone is a post-apocalyptic 2.5D shooter with a side view and elements of survival in the unique style of "eternal sunset".
